name: South Of Spain Sauce
keywords: pepper, tomato, vidalia onion, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 medium Italian frying peppers or 1 medium green bell pepper, seeded, deribbed and finely diced
1/2 medium Vidalia or other sweet onion, finely diced
2 medium tomatoes, cored and finely diced
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients. Pour the mixture on top of the roe that has been poached in water.
